snippet: A group of elected officials is calling on Mayor Bill de Blasio to halt plans for two residential towers at Pier 6, one of several recreational piers in Brooklyn Bridge Park.
abstract: Group of elected officials is calling on New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio to scale back plans for luxury housing in Brooklyn Bridge Park, intended to help pay for park's costly upkeep; urge de Blasio to halt plans for two residential towers at Pier 6.
lead_paragraph: A group of elected officials is calling on Mayor Bill de Blasio to halt plans for two residential towers at Pier 6, one of several recreational piers in Brooklyn Bridge Park.

headline.main: De Blasio Is Urged to Alter Housing Plans at Brooklyn Park
headline.print_headline: Mayor Is Urged to Alter Housing Plans at Brooklyn Park
